title: Moving Up To Continental Challenge Racing At Daytona - /SHAKEDOWN
description: Stevan McAleer won the 2012 Playboy Mazda MX-5 Cup Championship earning him the opportunity to step up to a season of Continental Tire Sports Car Challenge Racing, starting at Daytona, Feb 2013. Leo Parente and ShakeDown interview Stevan to learn how he went from coaching at an indoor kart track to professional auto racing - What it takes, What he did to get there, How he drives the race car so well.

asset.title: Moving Up To Continental Challenge Racing At Daytona - /SHAKEDOWN
asset.description:
Stevan McAleer won the 2012 Playboy Mazda MX-5 Cup Championship earning him the opportunity to step up to a season of Continental Tire Sports Car Challenge Racing, starting at Daytona, Feb 2013. Leo Parente and ShakeDown interview Stevan to learn how he went from coaching at an indoor kart track to professional auto racing - What it takes, What he did to get there, How he drives the race car so well.
